metadata.title: CVE-2017-14990 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: WordPress 4.8.2 stores cleartext wp_signups.activation_key values (butstores the analogous wp_users.user_activation_key values as hashes), whichmight make it easier for remote attackers to hijack unactivated useraccounts by leveraging database read access (such as access gained throughan unspecified SQL injection vulnerability).

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
